# Demo Stateful Hash-Based Signatures with Botan

1. Configure Botan.

```bash
make configure
```

2. Compile Botan.

```bash
make build
```

3. Install Botan.

```bash
make install
```

4. Generate and save private key.

```bash
botan keygen --algo=XMSS > priv
```

<details>
<summary>View example (click to expand)</summary>

```
-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----
MIIBIQIBADALBgkEAH8ADwEBDQAEggENBIIBCQAAAAS1zNduLGYV2/rf2cTkwo+i
EH0Jr+P3M1q8jGivslrDv7L6oRFLYKFqk39hZQ7WzYdYEZEUUHpxepK+4QYGAiYg
2vwr1j4LuYFq26qyL9N/c4W6R5yK2peIYdBcO2HiqpRFY/DTV/+mLaCl/x3zraRF
GH8YihehXjlB1i6+UNI/MQAAAAC7YxPW59P7gsqaeoC28S74p0sa1aZoMlglcmGt
AYBpgJ6e8rAr+8g6kSaBGbBeN2SZqKKn4UXmHJSwx7P9YDFDAP81zBiTUUfQM+6v
tGlWcI+wbNEiMk7nmKYyaSbznxZr8WrZR+6d+75T19gc55RavAcHmdXHao0wPkQw
pElEPwI=
-----END PRIVATE KEY-----
```

</details>

5. Create a copy of the private key.

```bash
cp priv priv-orig
```

6. Compute hash for private keys.
```bash
sha512sum priv*
```

<details>
<summary>View example (click to expand)</summary>

```
567f11067c36cc494eaf3530a6ee3e212c958cde61b7c0d048dd4f2b97b8deb00a0c17d188e0c4e8d0c51addf01c3110673ae6954ee93eeff462991f1840751d  priv
567f11067c36cc494eaf3530a6ee3e212c958cde61b7c0d048dd4f2b97b8deb00a0c17d188e0c4e8d0c51addf01c3110673ae6954ee93eeff462991f1840751d  priv-orig
```

</details>

7. Get and save public key from private key.

```bash
botan pkcs8 --pub-out priv > pub
```

<details>
<summary>View example (click to expand)</summary>

```
-----BEGIN PUBLIC KEY-----
MIGYMAsGCQQAfwAPAQENAAOBiAAEgYQAAAAEtczXbixmFdv639nE5MKPohB9Ca/j
9zNavIxor7Jaw7+y+qERS2ChapN/YWUO1s2HWBGRFFB6cXqSvuEGBgImINr8K9Y+
C7mBatuqsi/Tf3OFukecitqXiGHQXDth4qqURWPw01f/pi2gpf8d862kRRh/GIoX
oV45QdYuvlDSPzE=
-----END PUBLIC KEY-----
```

</details>

8. Generate signature for data `data`.

```bash
botan sign priv data > sig
```

<details>
<summary>View example (click to expand)</summary>

```

```

</details>

9. Compute hash again for private keys.

```bash
sha512sum priv*
```

<details>
<summary>View example (click to expand)</summary>

```
5c9fb599462f7ad7be8a198f74aebfd78368db79b216d82eebb23a9fbe26c72e529da67f3b4bbc8c2606e73cf5d00c16f7e07d982a5d79007b9299fd80c48b1b  priv
567f11067c36cc494eaf3530a6ee3e212c958cde61b7c0d048dd4f2b97b8deb00a0c17d188e0c4e8d0c51addf01c3110673ae6954ee93eeff462991f1840751d  priv-orig
```
</details>

10. Find differences between private keys.

```bash
diff priv priv-orig
```

<details>
<summary>View example (click to expand)</summary>

```
                            |
                            v
< GH8YihehXjlB1i6+UNI/MQAAAAG7YxPW59P7gsqaeoC28S74p0sa1aZoMlglcmGt
---
> GH8YihehXjlB1i6+UNI/MQAAAAC7YxPW59P7gsqaeoC28S74p0sa1aZoMlglcmGt
                            ^
                            |
```
</details>


11. Verify signature.

```bash
botan verify pub data sig
```

<details>
<summary>View example (click to expand)</summary>

```
Signature is valid
```

</details>
